summary.span: 提供類別，可將列印系統物件的屬性設定快速複製到另一個相同型別的物件。

span.span: Provides classes that enable rapidly copying the property settings of a print system object to another object of the same type.

summary.span: 另外，可在執行階段逐一查看列印系統物件的屬性並搜索其型別，而不需使用反映。

span.span: Also, enables iteration through the properties of print system objects and the discovery of their types at run time, without using reflection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個命名空間包含下列的核心類別：This namespace contains the following core classes: - 類別，這是大部分的其他類別的基底類別。The class, which is the base class for most of the other classes. - ，也就是其項目類別的所有執行個體衍生自。The , which is a whose entries are all instances of classes derived from . 此命名空間會讓您能夠探索在執行階段，而不使用反映的列印系統物件的屬性類型，例如， ，或。This namespace makes it possible to discover at run time, without using reflection, the types of the properties of print system objects, such as , , or . 如需示範類別如何使用這個命名空間中的範例，請參閱， ，和。For examples that show the use of the classes in this namespace, see , , and . 此命名空間是提供使用 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 的增強型列印服務的一部分。This namespace is part of the enhanced printing services provided with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF). 使用 Windows Form 的 managed 程式碼開發人員必須使用中的 Api命名空間。Managed code developers using Windows Forms must use the APIs in the namespace.
